1.16.2.1.16.5-2.0.1:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed model loading and tag warnings
1.16.2.1.16.5-2.0.0:
New Features:
+ Updated to work with Minecraft 1.16.5
- Updated to include the trees and biomes that Biomes o' Plenty has in 1.16.5

1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.1:
New Features:
+ Added flowering apple species that generates in orchards
Enhancements:
- Adjusted fruit tree generation
Bug Fixes:
+ Fixed tree generator completely replacing generation in swamplands and other biomes instead of adding to them
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.0:
New Features:
+ Added Persimmon tree as dying oak subspecies
+ Added Peach tree as a flowering oak subspecies
+ Added Pear tree as an oak species
+ Added seeds for Poplar and Dark Poplar species
+ Added config settings to disable or enable the features above
+ Populated xeric shrubland and tundra biomes with acacia and maple twiglets
+ Mega Umbran Conifer is now the mega variant of the Umbran Conifer, making it obtainable through the use of a Potion of Gigas
Enhancements:
+ Added version update checker
+ Updated water roots to use new model
+ Updated flowering oak to display flowers during felling animation
+ Renamed OakFloweringVine to OakIvyVines (as flowering vines were removed)
+ Updated textures slightly, making them more consistent
Bug Fixes:
+ Fixed jungle twiglets in oasis not having their proper species
+ Fixed missing translation for certain species
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.4.4:
New Features:
-Mangrove world generation
-Improvements to mangrove and rooty water block model
